Unnamed: 1: The Suncorp Sustainability Data Pack summarises our non-financial performance across key environmental, social and governance metrics for the period 1 July 2022 to 30 June 2023. This Data Pack accompanies our Annual Report, which includes performance highlights and our non-financial targets for FY24. A copy of this Report can be found on the Suncorp Group website.
Related policies, action plans, reports, statements and other disclosures can also be found on the Suncop Group website.

Note: All figures are for the 12 months ended 30 June 2023 for Suncorp Group, unless otherwise indicated. All dollar amounts are in Australian dollars, unless otherwise indicated. Totals may vary on occasion due to rounding.
